title: The Radical Adventure Riders 2021 Cycling Industry Pledge
content: Last year, the Cycling Industry Pledge was founded by the RAR. Its intent is to hold companies accountable to advance diversity, equity, and inclusion in the cycling community with signees making a commitment to actions outlined in the pledge. Weâ€™re proud to be a part of this initiative and have signed up once again. If your shop, company, or media outlet wants to sign up, you can read all about it at RAR.
